org.dsa.iot.dslink.handshake

Class RemoteKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.handshake.RemoteKey

  • public class RemoteKey
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles remote keys. The shared secret will be decrypted here.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RemoteKey generate(LocalKeys keys, java.lang.String tempKey) 
      byte[] getSharedSecret()
      Retrieves the decrypted shared secret.
      static byte[] normalize(byte[] sharedSecret)
      Ensures the shared secret is always 32 bytes in length.

        Retrieves the decrypted shared secret.

        shared secret

      • generate

        public static RemoteKey generate(LocalKeys keys,
                                 java.lang.String tempKey)
        Parameters:
        keys - Local keys necessary for the decryption
        tempKey - Temporary key received from the server
        Returns:
        A remote key.

      • normalize

        public static byte[] normalize(byte[] sharedSecret)
        Ensures the shared secret is always 32 bytes in length.
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - Shared secret to normalize
        Returns:
        Normalized shared secret
